purification of
the building up of a blameless life and

goodness and by goodness I mean
sinlessness is the beautiful and

one after another religions come and go

indwelling form thus will they become

goodness is religion we know nothing
higher than goodness we can conceive of
nothing more beautiful and goodness
beholding the perfect goodness men call

men men worship him as God we behold
Jesus as a sinless man in him is the

teachers of mankind are few a thousand

man and his teaching is never derived

teaches others how they may likewise
live the proof and witness of his
teaching is in himself his life out of
millions of preachers one only is
ultimately accepted by mankind
as the true teacher and the one who is
thus accepted and exalted is he who
lives all the others are mierda squishin
Aries and commentators and as such they
rapidly pass out of human Ken Jesus the
teacher lived in all his perfection and
in the face of the most adverse
conditions the divine life of love he
pursued the true life of goodwill as
distinguished from the false life of
self-seeking which the majority elect to
follow in him
there was no element of selfishness all
his thoughts words and acts being
prompted by the spirit of love to this
spirit of love he was so entirely
subjected his personality that he became
one with it
so much so that he literally became
divine love personified his complete
victory over the personality was
accomplished by obedience to the divine
law of love within himself
by virtue of which he became divine and
his whole teaching is to the effect that
all who practice the same obedience will
realize the same divine life will become
consciously divine the unalterable
meekness undying compassion sweet

life constitutes religion to deny them

men everywhere in their inmost hearts
though they may deny it argumentatively
know that goodness is divine and Jesus

origin and nature of his oneness with
God
